Blog.post: Today i m so tired that I go 4 Sports day n go 4 SJAB concert (that stupid concert)I saw my frenzs there 2!!!1 of my frienz change his clothings in the school general office and hall store 2 leh!His back of his body gt so much pimples so funny hahaha!!!
Tomorrow still need 2 go back 2 school Y I 2morrow still gt chinese oral n SJAB Concert Y I gt this type of luck Y!!!!I wish that 2morrow I can play soccer with my frienz again!!!

2Day I beri the tired from morning 7.30am go 2 school n have Chinese oral then go hm 4 1hr then come bk 2 school at 1.00pm so sad!!!The School dinner beri lousy leh!!!Only mee hoon n 1 stupid fried hotdog!!!The SJAB Parade very boring also!!!But The concert beri beri beri the good ah!!!I reach hm at 10.00 pm n i type this message in n bathed n sleep untill next day i think!!!Bye I gt 2 go !!!!

Hi everyone i m so happy 2day i saw my frienz terence (the chicken brain)run during p.e lesson so happy n after school I go 2 SP(singapore poly)I won the prize n my frienz won i m so happy!!!Hope there is more trips like this this trip is quite fun!!!OOOOOOOpPppppppppp!4get 2 do homework die now i must go n do so bye!

2day i m so happy that i perfrom the soldiers of joan of arc.so fun 2 be on stage the feeling is so gd i also take pic. with my form teacher,Ms Eunice Ong n my classmates who involves in the Joan of Arc!Hahahahahhha!!!!!

2day we celebrate national day !!!It was so fun u all noe i think we should do more than just singing national song!!!but it is still beri fun.but my frienz were the most poor chicken in the world Hahahahhahha.Wat ever he still need to stay back after the celebration so poor thing.This chicken is the person i mentioned earlier in my previous message.I repeated once more his name is terence rei nonis.U can call him brainless chicken,chicken brain,mayonise,no niece or no "tiny brother".During the celebration my frienz in my CCa(AVA) play my fav. song but the song is in english not in chinese.So sad.That song is the group S.H.E sing 1.the song name in chinese(han yu pin ying)pan tang zu yi.2day my message is until here!!!!

Hi every 1 once again i meet u all !!!2day i go 4 BBQ.I ask my frienz live nearby 2 go 2 the BBQ pot n meet me!!!We play badminton,soccer,yu-gi-oh cards and gameboy games!!!I bBQ my own food U C so fun U noe!!!The weather is so gd that it never rain!!!I lose 2 my frienz in the card duel so sad I m so tired now i want 2 sleep now wait 4 my next interesting message bye C U all next time!!!

Common test has arrived that i need 2 study its time 4 me 2 study i think^_^"Sometimes feel happy^_^ sometimes feel funny^_^"2day gt history n English common test,I scared that my compo will out of point leh'^_^'I choose the ambition 1 I write about i wat 2 be a singer I think when u all noe this u all will laugh^_^"

poor little thing that my shirt get red paint on my school uniform^_^"THAT Y i use red 2day so sad but when i reach home listened 2 S.H.E song then 4get war had happened haha^_^^_^ 2day i tok until here bye bye
